====== Site visit

|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:invertebrate-fauna-post-field-guideline-protocol-shapes:invertebrate-group:site-visit`

|Definition | Observations _MUST_ have a value for `tern:hasSiteVisit`.
